column4: hello all, I have a question about my floppy drive, I think maybe that my floppy drive has finally bite the dust becasue I can not access it in either linux or windows
but I am not sure, is there a diagnostic test I could run to find out for sure
if windows wont work with it its dead
probably unplugged inside your case :) the best way to test it is to tell bios to boot from it
